mapper.insert: INSERT into apply(apply_no , cook_no, applier_id , payment_option, apply_status, cook_status,check_date, review_status ) VALUES ( seq_apply_apply_no.nextval , #{classCook.cookNo},#{applier.userId}, #{paymentOption} , #{applyStatus} , #{cookStatus} , #{checkDate}, #{reviewStatus})
mapper.select: select * from apply where user_id=#{userId} and PAYMENT_OPTION=#{paymentOption} and check_date between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and NOW() order by check_date;
